author: srimanob
body:
- Add miniaod production step into the standard step of runTheMatrix (after harvesting).
  - miniaod production for PU RelVals (13TeV: 25ns, 50ns)
  - miniaod production for Real DATA RelVals (runD)
- Still keep miniaod production step from RECO (In case, we need to produce only miniaod)
title: miniaod integration to runTheMatrix for 70X
